amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to delete the provisions of the bill which reassign certain regulatory authority over ocean dumping and navigational dredging permits from EPA to the Army Corps of Engineers.
amendment.purpose: En Bloc amendments, consisting of two amendments (printed as amendments Nos. 42 and 43 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to delete the provisions of the bill which reassign certain regulatory authority over ocean dumping and navigational dredging permits from EPA to the Army Corps of Engineers.

action.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendments (A033) Failed by voice vote.
